customer_reviews.title: Great quality, sturdy build
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy build, straight forward to install. I installed it as recessed. Looks very sharp. I appreciate the molded finger grips on edged so no sharp edges and no need to smudge glass during opening. I also appreciate the glass on inside so no need to close door to see every time. I did add a few more holes for shelving level option to meet my needs but factory made spacing will meet needs of most people.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Really nice medicine cabinet !
customer_reviews.text: I've had several installed on walls & some installed into walls for many clients, friends and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: mirror arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a very similar unit from Pegasus before, and the product is a great value. However item arrived with the mirror broken so we returned and purchased at Home Depot. The replacement from Home Depot is great!
customer_reviews.author: Delta Gold

customer_reviews.title: Will buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this! It was just what we needed in our master bath. It replaced a flat mirror. So much storage space. DH installed it with a minimum of grumbling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality medicine cabinet. Good hinges, mirrored on the entire inside. The hinges are important and these look to be strong enough to hold the heavy doors and have adequate adjustment capability. I installed the first one in a recessed manner and it looks great. I have ordered another to surface mount and I believe it will work out fine also.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: Directions were very poor. Had to figure it out by trail and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not broken when it arrived. Directions were very poor. Had to figure it out by trail and error. Doors come off for a light and much easier installation. I would not buy this cabinet again.
customer_reviews.author: judy s.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking around and this one fits the size and look. It arrived in very good packaging and all the hardwares were there. The contractor finished hanging at no time. I was pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Chen

customer_reviews.title: Nicer in one piece
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews from everyone that received this medicine cabinet broken into pieces but I thought I would take a chance. Well I ended up having the same problem. If it had arrived in one piece it would have been great but that was my experience. If anyone else is looking for the same product, I would find a store to buy it in! This is just ridiculous!!! Not a happy camper.

customer_reviews.title: arrived broken twice so we returned it
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all, this is packed very poorly and the glass was shattered when it arrived. After 2 times we just returned it and bought a Kohler one. Amazon was great with the return though! UPS picked up at our house so we didn't have to take such a big thing anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Least expensive brand, super fast shipping, incredible quality, easy installation. Liked it so much after i bought a second. Plan to put in all bathrooms.

customer_reviews.text: for the price its good. the door hinges in concerned wont hold up over time though, i have feeling the screws will pull out of the wall its mounted on. specially if you dont baby it a little, dont want to just swing closed in a hurry.
